snippet.title: Grit and Valor - 1949 - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer | Guerrilla Collective 2024
snippet.description: Get a deep dive into the gameplay of Grit and Valor - 1949 in this latest trailer for the upcoming real-time tactics roguelite game. The trailer gives us a peek into the story of Grit and Valor - 1949's alternative WW2 history, where you will lead the brave resistance against the might of the brutal Axis powers. We also get a breakdown of gameplay, including your objective, how choosing your paths and field upgrades are critical to success, mech upgrades, and more. Grit and Valor - 1949 will be available on PC, PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X|S, and Nintendo Switch in 2025.
